address: No.1 Jianguomen Outer Street, Beijing, 100004, China
amenities: Opened: 2017 The Traders Hotel Beijing (Beijing Guomao Fandian) is in the heart of Beijing's main business and shopping district. With Subway Lines 1 and 10 Guomao Station nearby, guests can conveniently visit historic Beijing attractions like Tian'anmen Square and the Forbidden City via line 1 as well as iconic structures from Beijing's 2008 Olympics—the Bird's Nest, the Water Cube and Olympic Park—via line 10. This Beijing hotel, part of the international Shangri-La owned Traders line of hotels, offers first-class hospitality with beautifully appointed guestrooms, including suites, handicapped-friendly rooms and non-smoking rooms; each equipped with broadband Internet access, mini-bars, international direct dial telephones, satellite TVs and safes. Some rooms available overlook the hotel's garden terrace while others offer views of the Beijing skyline.To organize events, business guests can make full use of the 14 function halls, the largest of which can accommodate 300 guests, outfitted with slide projectors, overhead projectors, multi-system video players and multi-microphone systems.Guests of the Traders Hotel can exercise in the world-class fitness center or head to the hotel bowling alley for a game. An underground shopping complex connects the Traders Hotel Beijing to another Shangri-La hotel next door, the China World Hotel.

images: Wi-Fi in designated areasAirport pickup serviceRestaurantCaféBar
amenities: Opened: 2013 The New World Beijing Hotel (Beijing Xinshijie Jiudian) is conveniently located in the historic heart of the ancient capital a short walk from Chongwenmen station on Metro Line 2. Also nearby are popular Beijing attractions like the Wangfujing pedestrian street, Tiantan Park, the Forbidden City and Tian'anmen Square.  Diners can enjoy refined Cantonese cuisine as well as the spicy specialties of Hunan and Sichuan at the 8 Qinian Chinese restaurant or choose from the extensive buffet and a la carte menu at the all-day dining eatery. In the evening, guests can enjoy live music and stunning views of the old city at the stylish rooftop bar.  A dedicated team of event planners are on hand to organize conferences, meetings and banquets in the hotel's six function rooms and the grand ballroom, which is able to accommodate up to 360 people. The hotel also offers free parking and WiFi access in public areas.     To unwind, guests at this five-star Beijing hotel can get pampered at the spa, work out at the fitness center or take a dip in the indoor pool.
